# 7th Grade Math Tutor Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Interactive web-based math tutor for 7th grade students with play-based learning, skill testing, and WhatsApp sharing.

## Completed Steps
- ✅ Created copilot-instructions.md file
- ✅ Scaffolded project structure
- ✅ Created HTML interface with math topics
- ✅ Built interactive game modes
- ✅ Implemented scoring and progress tracking
- ✅ Added WhatsApp sharing functionality
- ✅ Created README documentation
- ✅ Tested and launched application

## Project Structure
- index.html - Main application interface
- styles.css - Styling and responsive design
- app.js - Core application logic
- games.js - Interactive game implementations
- topics/ - Math topic modules (algebra, geometry, etc.)

## Features Implemented
- Multiple math topics (Algebra, Geometry, Fractions, Percentages, Integers)
- Interactive game modes (Quiz, Puzzle, Challenge)
- Progress tracking and scoring system
- Difficulty levels (Easy, Medium, Hard)
- Timer and score calculation
- WhatsApp assignment sharing
- Responsive design for mobile and desktop

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code modular and well-commented
- Ensure accessibility for students
- Test on multiple devices
- Follow ES6+ JavaScript standards
- Use semantic HTML5
